intro.description: This cheatsheets guides you through the creation of a review.

item.title: Create Review
item.description: Create a new review by pressing the "Create a new review" button or by using the New-Wizard (CTRL+N, File->New->Other) and selecting "Review" from the "AgileReview" category. The "New Review" wizard will open. Enter the required (and optional) data. Click "Finish".

item.title: Finish
item.description: The new review is set "active". All new comments are assigned to this review.
